# PYVIZX — Simple Visualization for Everyone

A beginner-friendly visualization library created by **Ganeshamoorthy**.

## Features
✔ One-line charts  
✔ Bar, Line, Pie, Scatter, Histogram  
✔ Excel → chart in one line  
✔ Auto-save PNG  
✔ Beautiful color themes

## Example
```python
import pyvizx as viz

viz.bar(["A","B","C"], [10,20,15], title="Sales")
